00035 void Repository::createStorage(cstr className, CUrl url, cstr description, RDK2::Object* defaultObject) throw (InvalidOperation)
00036 {
00037     if (className == QUEUE_CLASSNAME)
00038         throw InvalidOperation("You cannot use createStorage() to create a queue property");
00039     addGenericProperty(className, url, description, defaultObject);
00040 }
00041 
00042 void Repository::valueChanged(CUrl url) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00043 {
00044     vector<ObjectDiff*> noDiff;
00045     valueChanged(url, noDiff);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void Repository::valueChanged(CUrl url, const vector<ObjectDiff*>& diffs) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00049 {
00050     if (isLocalProperty(url)) {
00051         for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00052             pushDiffInDiffQueue(url, (ObjectDiff*) diffs[i]->clone());
00053         }
00054     }
00055 
00056     if (isLocalProperty(url)) {
00057         Event* event = 0;
00058         //if (diffs.size() == 0) event = new EventPropertyUpdateValue(url);
00059         //else event = new EventPropertyUpdateDiff(url);
00060         wakeUpListeningSessions(url, event);
00061     }
00062 
00063     if (!isLocalProperty(url)) {
00064         sendStorageValueToHost(url, url.getHost(), Network::TCP_IP /*FIXME*/);
00065     }
00066 
00067     // send to remote hosts
00068     Url completeUrl = "rdk://" + getRepositoryName() + "/" + url;
00069 
00070     // send object to all remote repository that subscribed VALUE+ON_CHANGE
00071     sendStorageValuesToRemoteValueSubscribers(completeUrl, "",
00072         Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_VALUE, RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE);
00073 
00074     if (diffs.size() == 0) {
00075         // send object to all remote repository that subscribed DIFFS+ON_CHANGE
00076         sendStorageValuesToRemoteValueSubscribers(completeUrl, "",
00077             Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY, RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS, RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE);
00078     }
00079     else {
00080         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Sending %u diffs for property '%s'", diffs.size(), url.c_str());
00081         // send diffs to all remote repository that subscribed DIFFS+ON_CHANGE
00082         RemoteSubscriptionRegister* reg = &remoteSubscriptionRegister;
00083         vector<RRemoteSubscription> psendSub =
00084             reg->queryForPropertiesToSend(completeUrl, "", Network::NETPROTOCOL_ANY,
00085             RRemoteSubscription::STORAGE_DIFFS, RRemoteSubscription::ON_CHANGE);
00086         for (vector<RRemoteSubscription>::iterator it = psendSub.begin(); it != psendSub.end(); ++it) {
00087             for (size_t i = 0; i < diffs.size(); i++) {
00088                 sendStorageDiffToHost(it->completeUrl, it->askingHost, it->socketType,
00089                     (ObjectDiff*) diffs[i]->clone());
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void Repository::wakeUpListeningSessions(CUrl url, Event* /*event*/) throw (NoSuchProperty)
00096 {
00097     lock(url, HERE);
00098     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00099 
00100     // wake up sessions listening to this property
00101     for (set<Session*>::iterator it = p->listeningSessions.begin(); it != p->listeningSessions.end(); ++it) {
00102 //      Event* newEvent = new Event(*event);
00103         //RDK_DEBUG_PRINTF("Waking up session %x", *it);
00104 //      (*it)->eventsMutex.lock(HERE);
00105 //      (*it)->currentEvents.push_back(newEvent);
00106 //      (*it)->eventsMutex.unlock();
00107         (*it)->wakeUp();
00108     }
00109     unlock(url);
00110     //delete event;
00111 }

00113 // FIXME dentro session
00114 void Repository::setObject(CUrl url, RDK2::Object* object) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00115 {
00116     lock(url, HERE);
00117     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00118     if (!p->isStorage()) {
00119         // FIXME
00120         throw InvalidOperation("Property '" + url + "' is not a storage");
00121     }
00122     p->setObjectL(object);
00123     unlock(url);
00124 }
00125 
00126 bool Repository::pushDiffInDiffQueue(CUrl url, ObjectDiff* diff) throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00127 {
00128     bool b = false;
00129     // FIXME unlock prima del trock
00130     lock(url, HERE);
00131     Property* p = getProperty(url);
00132     if (!p->isStorage()) throw InvalidOperation("Property '" + url + "' is not a storage");
00133     b = p->diffsQueue.push(diff, HERE);
00134     p->diffsQueue.gc(HERE);
00135     unlock(url);
00136     return b;
00137 }
